cast.overview: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine.
cast.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2

crew.overview: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine.
crew.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2

crew.overview: Queen Poppy and Branch make a surprising discovery — there are other Troll worlds beyond their own, and their distinct differences create big clashes between these various tribes. When a mysterious threat puts all of the Trolls across the land in danger, Poppy, Branch, and their band of friends must embark on an epic quest to create harmony among the feuding Trolls to unite them against certain doom.
crew.title: Trolls World Tour

details.biography: Sean Charmatz (he/him) is an artist and animator from California and is currently a codirector at DreamWorks. He has worked in the animation industry since 2005 and has most notably served as a writer and director on SpongeBob SquarePants and as the director of Orion and the Dark, in addition to designing, storyboarding, and developing shows for Disney and DreamWorks.
details.name: Sean Charmatz
